messages.author: samarth
messages.text: I would just call this RenderViewGone. We don't prefix any of other methods in the delegate with InstantClient.

messages.author: Shishir
messages.text:
On 2012/12/06 21:39:07, samarth wrote:
> I would just call this RenderViewGone. We don't prefix any of other methods in
> the delegate with InstantClient.

Done.

messages.author: samarth
messages.text: Will GetPreviewContents will return non-NULL value here? We want to make sure we reset model_ when the loader crashes.

messages.author: samarth
messages.text:
In general, does it matter if we continue trying to send IPCs to the non-existent render view? We have InstantLoader keep track of when the crash happened and drop any IPC requests after that point.

I doubt it matters but wanted to check.

messages.author: Shishir
messages.text:
On 2012/12/06 21:39:07, samarth wrote:
> Will GetPreviewContents will return non-NULL value here? We want to make sure we
> reset model_ when the loader crashes.

Its the WebContents that calls this method (RenderViewGone) on the obeservers, so it has to be alive at this point.

messages.author: Shishir
messages.text:
On 2012/12/06 21:39:07, samarth wrote:
> In general, does it matter if we continue trying to send IPCs to the
> non-existent render view? We have InstantLoader keep track of when the crash
> happened and drop any IPC requests after that point.
> 
> I doubt it matters but wanted to check.

I dont think it matters much since this should be a rare occurrence. I am in favor of keeping the logic simple and not adding more state.

messages.author: samarth
messages.text: Let's call this something that makes it clear that it's the loader that crashed, like InstantLoaderRenderViewGone (or InstantLoaderCrashed if there other paths that may want to trigger this).

messages.author: Shishir
messages.text:
On 2012/12/06 21:39:07, samarth wrote:
> Let's call this something that makes it clear that it's the loader that crashed,
> like InstantLoaderRenderViewGone (or InstantLoaderCrashed if there other paths
> that may want to trigger this).

Done.
